title: Caroline's Treasures SS8382MP Starry Night Australian Shepherd Mouse Pad, Hot Pad or Trivet for Home Office Gaming Working Computers Laptop Mouse Mat,Washable Large Mousepad
features: Multifunctional Design - Caroline's Treasures Mouse Pad works not only as an efficient mouse pad but also doubles up as a heat-resistant hot pad or trivet, ensuring a versatile tool for your workspace or kitchen.
High-Performance Surface - Featuring a long-lasting polyester surface, this mouse pad guarantees optimal tracking for precise cursor movement and an overall enhanced computing experience.
Non-Slip Grip - Backed with a sure-grip rubber material, the pad ensures stability during use, preventing unwanted slips and movements, ideal for both office and home settings.

Heat Resistant & Easy-to-Clean - Capable of withstanding temperatures up to 400 degrees, this pad can safely accommodate hot kitchenware. Its permanently dyed design means it's not only visually appealing but also easy to clean, maintaining its vibrant look for a long time.
